seo_description: With this app, you can easily download files from anywhere. Enjoy fast, free downloads with seamless browser extension support.
seo_keywords: 下載管理員，下載，瀏覽器擴充套件，chrome，firefox，ab下載管理員，開源，免費
home_hero_description: With this app, you can easily download files from anywhere. Enjoy fast, free downloads with seamless browser extension support.
home_feature_multi_threaded_description: 使用多執行緒下載檔案，下載速度最快提升 500%
home_feature_multiplatform_description: This software is currently available for Windows and Linux, with other platforms on the way!
home_feature_open_source_description: This is a completely free and open source software
home_feature_queue_description: Create and manage your downloads in queues , allowing all your files to be downloaded sequentially
home_feature_scheduler_description: You can set up a scheduler for your queues to start and stop them automatically
home_feature_simple_ui_description: Simple UI and dark mode by default
home_feature_speed_limiter_description: You can set a limit on your download speeds to prevent others from experiencing a poor connection :)
home_feature_browser_integration_descrip: You can install the browser extension to automatically capture links from your web browser
experimental_platform_warning: {platform} 版本目前還在實驗階段，部分功能可能無法正常執行！
